c74object.name: rtt.scala~

method.name: in2
method.description:
A set of values, given as a list, for a scale described using the Scala format. The first value is the count of notes, followed either by floats defining a value in cents (example: 579.47057) or a ratio of two ints (example: 5/4). For more information, see the
the Scala documentation.

method.name: scale-list
method.description: The same as in4, prepended by the symbols "message scale-list"

attribute.name: referencefreq
attribute.digest: The frequency to which referencenote will be tuned.

attribute.name: referencenote
attribute.digest: The reference note in a Scala KBM file. Sets the reference note which is to be tuned to the referencekey. By default, this is MIDI note 69.

attribute.name: middlenote
attribute.digest: The middle note in a Scala KBM file. This is the note that corresponds to the first scale degree. More information on KBM can be found at https://www.huygens-fokker.org/scala/help.htm#mappings

attribute.name: root
attribute.digest: A value between 0 and 11 that represents the root note in the scale, where 0 is C and 11 is B.

c74object.description: Use rtt.scala~ to conform MIDI note values to any scala using a Scala file.
c74object.digest: Map MIDI note values to any scale
